◆ m_shadowIndices

std::array<int, NUM_SHADOWS_PER_LIGHT_TYPE * NUM_SHADOW_MAP_TEXTURES> rev::LightingSettings::m_shadowIndices
protected

Indices of lights corresponding to each available shadow slot.

A negative index indicates no assigned light
